Text: Thanks, this is an extremely important series. That everyone should watch.

only issue is he does exactly what he accuses others of doing, sowing fears based on conspiracy theories. stretching credibility through selective use of facts to come up with his paranoid narrative of powerful cabals running the world.  normally he is rather clever, but this time he's gone straight into conspiracy territory.
Check out Michael Ruppert lectures at universities on youtube. He has quite a few facts that paints a scary picture that there are a few elites that try to push the system in one direction.
